channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 493 Cases of Sextortion Against Children Linked to Notorious Scam Compounds
item.description: Scam compounds in Cambodia, Myanmar, and Laos have conned people out of billions. New research shows they may be linked to child sextortion crimes too...

item.title: Labubus Are on Track to Be a Billion-Dollar Business This Year
item.description: Pop Mart, the Chinese company behind the Labubu franchise, has sold $670 million worth of related products so far this year—more than iconic US toy li...

item.title: US spy chief says UK has dropped its Apple backdoor demand
item.description: Tulsi Gabbard said that President Donald Trump and Vice President JD Vance also participated in the negotiations with the U.K. government over its onc...

item.title: Figure’s IPO filing marks Mike Cagney’s return to public markets
item.description: Figure Technology, a seven-year-old blockchain-based lending company, has filed a registration statement with the SEC for an IPO of its Class A common...

item.title: Dell 14 Premium Review: Hello Old Friend
item.description: The replacement for the Dell XPS 14 has arrived, but outside of the name change, this gorgeous laptop is as divisive as ever.

item.title: TikTok’s latest feature lets college students find and connect with classmates
item.description: In a move reminiscent of Facebook's early days, TikTok is launching a new feature that allows college students to find and connect with others on thei...

item.title: The AI-Powered PDF Marks the End of an Era
item.description: As Adobe rolls out more generative AI features for the PDF, the era of chatbot-less software is firmly a thing of the past.

item.title: The Global Car Reckoning Is Here. Far Too Many Auto Companies Don’t Have a Plan
item.description: How are the CEOs of Ford, BYD, Lamborghini, Polestar, and more planning to survive the hellscape that is the current automotive world? We asked them.

item.title: CPG startup Keychain snags $30M to build in India, grow in the U.S.
item.description: Keychain doesn't have a single customer in India — but the team helping it scale across North America and beyond is entirely based in Gurugram, a subu...

item.title: Nvidia said to be developing new, more powerful AI chip for sale in China
item.description: Nvidia is apparently putting together a new AI chip meant for sale in China that's half as powerful as its flagship B300 Blackwell GPU. The new chip w...
